# Government Tender Alert

## Tender Details

* **Tender Number**: 3Y004-230019
* **Tender Name**: Supply and Delivery of Light Duty Trucks

## Contract Details

* **Contract Title**: 3Y004-230019 - Véhicules utilitaires légers (VUL) (English: Light Duty Trucks)
* **Reference Number**: WS3768664857-Doc3791837590
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: January 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 31, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023

## Procurement Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Trade Agreements**: Various international trade agreements apply
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

## Deliverables

* **End Users**: Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR)
* **Delivery Locations**: Cambridge Bay, Nunavut

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Matthew Keenan ( matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca )

## Additional Information

* All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery or CanadaBuys.
* Bids must be received by 14:00 EST on January 31, 2023. Any late submissions will be considered non-responsive.
* The procurement is limited to firms registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR)
